attributes.additional_details:
I and hopefully many other sufferers in my predicament are asking you to stop producing nickel plated coins.

I have recently been diagnosed as suffering from a nickel allergy.

It started in November, I had such a terrible rash on my face that I had to be given a course of steroid tablets.  Since then I have intermittently been on a potent steroid cream. I will be shortly going on an immuno-suppressant cream to stop my immune system attacking my body. I have only just been diagnosed with this allergy.  My Doctor told me to not handle any coins, or any other metal, and don't touch my face.
1 in 10 people are affected by a nickel allergy, and like me has to wear gloves when touching any coins or anything metal.  I have spent the last three days trying to avoid metal or wearing gloves.
Its Life Changing.
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-2344658/Why-allergic-bra-Nickel-coins-caused-surge-eczema-But-thats-just-start-.html
